name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong proficiency in Web Testing and Mobile Testing, utilizing tools like **TestRail** and **Jira** to ensure high-quality deliverables. I am skilled in A/B Testing methodologies to enhance user experience and product performance. My extensive knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) enables me to develop effective testing strategies that align with project requirements.
In addition, I have a solid foundation in using **Git** for version control and **SQL** for database querying, ensuring comprehensive test coverage. My background as a Full Stack Developer provides me with unique insights into the development process, allowing for more effective collaboration with development teams. Furthermore, I have substantial experience with APIs and implementing testing frameworks, which supports my ability to deliver robust testing solutions in complex environments.
